summary.description: A tool for detecting bipartite motifs by considering base interdependencies | A DNA sequence motif finding program | DIpartite is a tool for detecting bipartite motif based on dinucleotide weight matrix | DIpartite predicts transcription factor binding sites (TFBSs) based on PWM or DWM. Bipartite motif is defined as two conserved blocks separated by variable gaps
summary.name: DIpartite
